name: Apocalyptic Super Farm
author: 诶嘿工作室
content: The apocalypse has dawned upon the world, and food and survival are once again the most important topics of people&#039s concern. Rice and flour have become luxuries, and vegetables are even more expensive! But just then, someone posted a video on a website that shocked the world. Sweet vegetables rolled into a hot pot, emitting a tantalizing green color! A golden leg of lamb is seared in oil! Fish soup simmers as white as milk!
